Detailed Description

Prototypes the default interface plugins for IFM

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum IFM_CAPTION_STYLES
 

Enumerator:
IFM_CAPTION_MASK  Mask to access caption styles.
IFM_CAPTION_TITLE_MASK  Mask to acces caption title styles.
IFM_CAPTION_SOLID  Draw a solid caption.
IFM_CAPTION_GRADIENT  Draw a gradient caption.
IFM_CAPTION_LEFT  Left align the caption title.
IFM_CAPTION_CENTER  Center align the caption title.
IFM_CAPTION_RIGHT  Right align the caption title.
